channel.title: Bridge collapsed in Minneapolis by my house killing 6 people
channel.description:
A bridge collapsed close to my house in Minneapolis. My mom goes over that bridge almost every day and I've gone over it before. My mom went a different way today and if she would have gone the regular way she could have been on it when it collapsed.
News article:
http://www.startribune.com/462/story/1338294.html

item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

I saw this on the news, but I wasn’t really paying attention to it. BTW, your mother must be a very lucky woman.

item.source: Bridge collapsed in Minneapolis by my house killing 6 people

item.title: Bridge collapsed in Minneapolis by my house killing 6 people
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

Click Here:

O.o This bridge must of been VERY old. and if not, the council you have, should have made Regular checks on the bridge to make it safe to cross. if not, then its potentially dangerous… as of what happened now O.o

Dude. You must not now alot about this bridge. It crosses over the missippi river. It was one of the main bridges in Minnesota. It wasn’t an old bridge and had bi-annual inspections every year. It couldn’t have been structure damages because it was said to be in great condition by the reports and the work they were doing on the actual bridge was more of cosmetic work and not structure.

Read full topic

[/quote]

actuley i just watch the news
